posts.post_content:
For sale is one of the best looking SGC 30 T206 Cobb bat off cards that you will ever come across.  This card has no back damage and was overly downgraded solely due to the miscut.

Asking $895 plus shipping.  Email: [url]jkrasner2@mindspring.com[/url]

[IMG]http://i40.photobucket.com/albums/e211/jkrasner2/1909-11T206CobbBatOnf.jpg[/IMG]
Not to nitpick you JK, but you might want to change your title to "bat on".  LOL
